articles.content: The sides had a spiteful match just three days ago but Australian teammates and respective captains Aaron Finch and Carey have ensured a fair match after an error with the first innings Power Surge.… [+3239 chars]

articles.title: Rugby: Former All Black Lima Sopoaga credits addressing mental health with form reversal - New Zealand Herald
articles.description: After moving to England in 2018, the former All Black quickly lost favour. Now he's back.
articles.content:
Former All Black first five eighth Lima Sopoaga has opened up about how a therapist helped turn around his rugby form on English soil, saying it was one of the best experiences of his life.
